He was intended to roam the [[Enchanted Forest]] with a band of satyrs and [[faun]]s, disabling you with powerful [[Hexes]] while his allies riddled you with [[arrow]]s and [[sling bullet]]s. ==Spells== {{Spellcaster |number= |slot1=''none'' |slot2=[[Mass Confusion]] |slot3=''none'' |slot4=[[Metabolic Englaciation]] |slot5=[[Sleep]] |slot6=[[Blink]] }} {{clear}} ==History== Pan was a unique that existed in [[trunk]] for a very brief period of time. He was originally intended to be included in [[0.13]], but was disabled shortly after his introduction, and removed not long thereafter. [[Category:Obsolete monsters]]
